Sentencas: Nowadays, for a new technology to be successfully introduced, it should compete not only in terms of economy, but also in terms of ecology.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, end-of-pipe treatments are no longer sufficient, but precautionary environmental protection is also necessary.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The aim of the present work is an environmental analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology using the 'Environmental Precaution Study'.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Constituent materials, energy and emission flows are determined and evaluated throughout the entire life cycle.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cradle to grave considerations embrace the production of raw materials and technical equipment, respectively, operation and dismantling.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A reference SOFC cell of the planar cell type, based on the current fuel cell programme of the Research Centre Julich, has been compared with a conventional technology in the form of a 10 MW gas turbine.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The latter has been chosen as the competitive conventional technology, because the power output is similar to the expected SOFC power output and the use of the same fuel, natural gas, facilitates the comparison.
Titulo: Environmental analysis of solid oxide fuel cells
